components.name: Query Processor
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with query processing.

fields.description:
Currently Not all operators match their Output Obj inspectors to Row schema.
Many times OutputObjectInspectors may be more than needed.

This causes problems especially with union.
fields.summary: Keep Obj Inspectors in Sync with RowSchema

comments.body: Removed the fixed version and it can be filled once this gets resolved.
[~ashutoshc] I think if we get TS to match OutputObjInsp to RowSchema (similar to Select) that might be sufficient.

Thinking more about this I am not clear whats the ask here is. TS does no processing whatsover so its inputOI is same as outputOI, so its in sync already  : ) and there is no good reason for its outputOI to be different than inputOI especially given the fact it doesnt even *touch* the data.
[~jpullokkaran] Can you expand a little bit on what you are thinking here. An example query to illustrate your point would be even better.
Removing 2.1.0 target. Please feel free to commit to branch-2.1 anyway and fix for 2.1.0 if this happens before the release.
